CustomField.description: Disabled: Survey results are not cached | Enabled: Cache survey results to enhance performance when initiating a new response.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Disabled: Survey is not cached. Enabled: Cache survey to enhance performance when initiating a new response. Results are saved on auto-save or first user action (clicking prev, next, save, submit etc.). To use as form to capture results only on submit, make sure to disable auto-save, create a single page survey or form and move survey to 'Open' status.
CustomField.label: Survey Caching
